name: Rhythm Racer (DonPasquale)
description:
Hi!

This is Rhythm Racer, a small rhythm game where you drive a car. This was made for the Mini Jam 125.
To include the theme I Initially watend to add a narrative of the player being some kind of hacker. Your goal would then be to hack different companies, But due to time constraints I ended up not going for it. It still has this "matrix"-like background though.

CONTROLS: 
A/D or <-/-> to move
ESC for pause

If you encounter any performance issues please try the desktop version :)
